parameters.description: Array of faces that describe the tool body

parameters.name: Options
parameters.description: Options for this operation as defined in swImprintingFacesOpts_e

title: IModeler.ImprintingFaces
description: Imprints the specified tool faces onto the specified target faces.
signature:
System.Boolean ImprintingFaces( 
   System.Object
TargetFaceArray
,
   System.Object
ToolFaceArray
,
   System.Int32
Options
,
   out System.Object
TargetEdges
,
   out System.Object
ToolEdges
,
   out System.Object
TargetVertices
,
   out System.Object
ToolVertices
)

parameters.name: TargetFaceArray
parameters.description: Array of faces that describe the target body

parameters.name: ToolFaceArray
parameters.description: Array of faces that describe the tool body

parameters.name: Options
parameters.description: Options for this operation as defined in swImprintingFacesOpts_e

returns: True if the operation was successful, false if not
remarks:
The target and tool faces must:
belong to different bodies.
intersect each other.
